answers.answer: Was this the one hour test ?

YOU WILL BE OK, YOU HAVE NOT FAILED!!!!! JUST MEANS YOU NEED TO WATCH YOUR SUGAR SO IT DOESNT GET TO HIGH THAT WAY THE BABY IS NOT HARMED, THEY SHOULD HAVE TOLD YOU WHAT TO DO AND EXPECT IF THEY DIDNT THEN YOU SHOULD CALL AND ASK QUESTIONS, BUT YOU DIDNT FAIL AS A MOM DONT FEEL  BAD

They will make you do a 3 hour test next. You will go in fasting get some blood drawn drink a nasty drink, and get your blood drawn 1 and 2 hours after you drank that stuff. .. if that comes back out of range then they send you to a nutritionist and have you start checking your sugars at home, then go from there. I am dealing with gestational diabetes too so if you have any other questions feel free to contact me. It's very common and all due to our stupid hormones going crazy.
Its OK they will make you do a three hour.if you failed that then its time to rethink your diet.

question: So I took the test today and sugar came back to high and now am super upset cuz I though I was doing good with sweets and stayinag away from junk food but I guess not: (What are they going to do now or what should I expect this is my first baby and I feel like I have already failed and my baby isn't even here yet.....
title: glucose test and bad results and am freaking out!!!!
